# Darryl Cauldwell - Technical Blog & Portfolio

> Personal website of Darryl Cauldwell, a cloud infrastructure and DevOps professional with expertise in VMware, Kubernetes, AWS, and automation.

## Site Overview

This is a technical blog covering cloud infrastructure, containerization, automation, and DevOps practices. The author has 20+ years of experience in IT infrastructure, holding certifications including VCP, VCAP, AWS Solutions Architect, and CKA.

## Content Categories

### Cloud (/cloud/)
Articles about public cloud platforms including AWS, Azure, and cloud-native services. Topics include EC2, Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, CloudFormation, and cloud architecture patterns.

### Kubernetes (/kubernetes/)
Container orchestration content covering Kubernetes deployments, Tanzu, Antrea networking, Knative, and cloud-native application patterns.

### VMware (/vmware/)
Enterprise virtualization topics including vSphere, NSX-T networking, vRealize Automation, VCF (VMware Cloud Foundation), and software-defined datacenter concepts.

### Automation (/automation/)
Infrastructure as Code and automation content covering Ansible, Terraform, Python scripting, PowerShell, and CI/CD pipelines.

### Homelab (/homelab/)
Personal lab setup guides including Raspberry Pi clusters, Intel NUC configurations, and home networking projects.

### Career (/career/)
Professional development content including DevOps practices, SRE principles, and technology career guidance.

## Key Topics Covered

- **NSX-T**: Network virtualization, microsegmentation, distributed firewall, load balancing
- **Terraform**: Infrastructure provisioning for VMware and cloud platforms
- **Ansible**: Configuration management and automation playbooks
- **Kubernetes**: Container orchestration, Tanzu Kubernetes Grid, networking
- **AWS**: EC2, Lambda, DynamoDB, CloudFormation, VPC design
- **Python**: Automation scripts, API integrations, SDK usage
- **Docker**: Container networking, image building, Docker Compose

## Author Information

- **Name**: Darryl Cauldwell
- **Role**: Cloud Infrastructure & DevOps Professional
- **Experience**: 20+ years in IT infrastructure
- **Certifications**: VCP, VCAP, AWS SA, CKA
- **Bio**: /bio/
- **CV**: /cv/

## Technical Stack

This site runs on:
- Astro (static site generator)
- Caddy (web server with automatic HTTPS)
- Full observability stack: Prometheus, Grafana, Loki

## Navigation

- Home: /
- All Posts: /post/
- Tags: /tags/
- Observability Dashboard: /observability/

## Contact

The author can be reached through the social links on the website footer including LinkedIn and GitHub.

## Content License

Technical articles are provided for educational purposes. Code examples may be used freely with attribution.
